title: Trade Chatter with Bobby Marks and Picking All-Stars with Kevin Pelton
description:
Zach runs through the names being bandied about ahead of the trade deadline with ESPN's Bobby Marks. Then Kevin Pelton stops by to select All-Star rosters.
